description: These Thai Peanut Noodle Bowls are packed with fresh vegetables and topped with a super flavorful Thai Peanut Sauce!
name: Thai Peanut Noodle Bowls with Vegetables
recipeIngredient: 1 (8 oz) box rice noodles (I used maifun noodles)
1 1/3 cup thinly sliced red bell pepper
Optional toppings: fresh lime juice, peanuts, cilantro, green onion
1/2 cup room temperature creamy peanut butter (I like to use no sugar added)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and cook noodles according to package directions. Drain noodles and rinse with cold water.
Add all peanut sauce ingredients to a medium sized bowl and whisk until combined.
Divide the noodles and vegetables into four separate portions and top with desired amount of peanut sauce. Garnish with your favorite garnishes.

video.description:
These Thai Peanut Noodle Bowls with Vegetables are easy to  make, super flavorful and great for a healthy lunch or dinner!  They're also great for a meal prep lunch!  They come together in just about 15 minutes and are perfect for a light summertime meal!  

Full Recipe: https://www.shelikesfood.com/thai-peanut-noodle-bowls/
video.name: How To Make Thai Peanut Noodle Bowls
